Changes.Target: Maps/spring_recipes, Maps/spring_recipes_Sat, Maps/summer_recipes, Maps/summer_recipes_Sat, Maps/fall_recipes, Maps/fall_recipes_Sat, Maps/winter_recipes, Maps/winter_recipes_Sat

When.DayOfWeek: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Sunday
Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Sunday

Entries.Zamir.1: Zamir: My sister looks after the shop on Saturday so I can go into the city and restock. If you have any requests, put in an order on the catalogue and I'll do my best to procure your items.
Entries.Zamir.2: It's Khadija's jar! She really loves hiding in it...
Entries.Zamir.3: KHADIJA'S RECIPE SHOP - PELICAN TOWN^Open from 8 AM to 7 PM Sun-Fri, Except Summer^New wares daily!
Entries.Nasira.1: It's Nasira's catalogue. She's crossed out all the fields for vegetables and recipes furiously in bright red pen.
Entries.Nasira.2: There's a little velvet pillow inside! Khadija probably snuggles up in there when it's time to go home.
Entries.Nasira.3: KHADIJA'S EQUIPMENT SHOP - PELICAN TOWN^Open from 8 AM to 7 PM Saturdays, Except Summer^New wares weekly!
Entries.Nasira.4: Nasira's Meats and Weapons - Saturdays Only
Entries.Summer.1: What a cute ja- GAH! Oh, it's just Khadija! Hello to you too!
Entries.Summer.2: An ice chest packed full of fresh meat. Curiously, there's no ice inside, but you can definitely feel a sharp chill emanating from it.
Entries.Summer.3: KHADIJA'S RECIPE SHOP - DESERT LOCATION^Open from 8 AM to 7 PM Sun-Fri, Summer Only^New wares daily!
Entries.SummerSat.1: Khadija is wiggling excitedly at you. Maybe you should blep back?
Entries.SummerSat.2: Nasira: My brother enchanted that chest so it's always cold. I'm not very good at magic so I have to haul it in myself every weekend.
Entries.SummerSat.3: KHADIJA'S EQUIPMENT SHOP - DESERT LOCATION^Open from 8 AM to 7 PM Saturdays, Summer Only^New wares weekly!
Entries.SummerSat.4: Nasira's Meats and Weapons - Saturdays Only

Entries.Zamir.1: 扎米尔：星期六我姐姐照看商店，以便我进城去进货。如果您有任何要求，请在商品目录上订购，我将尽力为您采购所需商品。
Entries.Zamir.2: 是卡迪亚的罐子！她真的很喜欢躲在里面...
Entries.Zamir.3: 卡迪亚的食谱商店 - 鹈鹕镇^营业时间为星期日至星期五上午8时至晚上7时，夏季除外^每天都有新商品！
Entries.Nasira.1: 这是纳斯拉的商品清单。她用红笔以猛烈的气势划掉了所有的蔬菜和食谱。
Entries.Nasira.2: 里面有一个小天鹅绒枕头！当该回家的时候，卡迪亚可能会蜷伏在那里。
Entries.Nasira.3: 卡迪亚的设备商店 - 鹈鹕镇^星期六上午8时至下午7时开放，夏天除外^每天都有新商品！
Entries.Nasira.4: 纳斯拉的肉类和武器 - 周六限定
Entries.Summer.1: 多可爱啊！哦，只是卡迪亚！也向你问好！
Entries.Summer.2: 装满了鲜肉的冰柜。奇怪的是，里面没有冰，但你肯定能感觉到一股刺骨的寒意从里面散发出来。
Entries.Summer.3: 卡迪亚的食谱商店 - 沙漠分店^营业时间为星期日至星期五上午8时至晚上7时，仅限夏季^每天都有新商品！
Entries.SummerSat.1: 卡迪亚兴奋地对你扭动着，也许你应该回以一个吐舌？
Entries.SummerSat.2: 纳斯拉：我哥哥给那个箱子施了魔法，所以它总是很冷。我不太擅长魔法，所以每个周末我都得自己练习。
Entries.SummerSat.3: 卡迪亚的设备商店 - 沙漠分店^周六上午8点至下午7点开放，仅限夏季^每天都有新商品！
Entries.SummerSat.4: 纳斯拉的肉类和武器 - 周六限定
